name: Astrocreep 2: Invasion
description:
Click around the area to help the alien take over! But look out, you are vulnerable... eat humans in creative ways to evolve to your final form!

THIS GAME IS PART OF A SERIES! Try these other installments:

Astrocreep

Aquacreep (3D)

Astrocreep HOMECOMING

Biomass

^ This game is currently being REMADE in 3D!

NOTE: The 2D version is has some debug text in the playable build. You can use it to cheat, or you can remove it completely by pressing TAB
